name: OBG.COFFEE.STAND
review_1_text: Good good!
review_2_text: Very nice
review_3_text: A cute, cozy little shop with delicious and affordable coffee.
review_4_text: This cool and cute new little shop is amazing! üê¥üêà The air conditioning is great, the staff are lovely and helpful, the drinks are delicious and reasonably priced. Perfect for chilling out, it's not crowded. They also sell some cute trinkets! ‚ú®‚ú®
review_5_text:
The shop isn't big, but it's beautifully decorated with many photo opportunities. You should wear bright, colorful clothes to make your photos look great.

The coffee tastes good, and the prices are average. There's street parking available, but you might have to circle around a bit to find it.

9/10

name: ‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ú‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πå (‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡πÅ‡∏Æ‡∏õ‡∏õ‡∏µ‡πâ) 2/1 ‡∏ñ‡∏ô‡∏ô ‡πÄ‡∏à‡∏î‡∏µ‡∏¢‡πå‡∏õ‡∏•‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡∏ö‡∏•‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ú‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å ‡∏≠‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏†‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏á ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏á‡∏´‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
review_1_text: Coffee, cocoa, pink milk, affordable prices

name: Thaidenmark Milkshop CMRU
review_1_text: A branch shop in Rajabhat University. A small shop, but okay.

name: Co Lay Co Lay Cha
review_1_text: Bubble milk tea, 20 baht. Pearls are free with every cup.

name: im-oon ‡∏≠‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏≠‡∏∏‡πà‡∏ô
review_1_text: The shop is cute and the atmosphere is great. The drinks are good and the staff are attentive to detail, which is excellent. I like it.

name: Rainy Sunny
review_1_text: They have MANY services! Do not be fooled by the bottles, they offer tote bags, canvases (in many shapes) sand painting, painting clay and bottles! The food was actually amazing and service was quick, waiters are nice and efficient. The atmosphere was amazing, had live music but would recommend coming on a day where it is not blazing hot as it is only outdoor seating. This is definitely a revisit!! The best place ever to chill and enjoy good food
review_2_text:
So calm, laid back nice atmosphere for just relax/ laptop or painting.
Liked the music, have wifi. And coffee is nice too.

Become my secret goto place for basically doing me time.
review_3_text: We loved this as a Sunday activity for a family! We came and painted 3 bottles and had some brunch and drinks. The bottles were just 40 THB each and you can choose which paints etc you want. There‚Äôs a small ask that everyone who paints also buys a drink which we think is fair and the prices are all reasonable! Our son who is 4 loved it, and us parents did too. If you‚Äôre a family and wonder what it‚Äôs like we recently showed it on our YouTube ‚Äúbest places for outdoors as a family Chiang Mai‚Äù
review_4_text: An introvert-friendly spot. Spent the entire afternoon here, doing my own art haha. Would recommend ‚Äî the fried chicken bites were tasty too.
review_5_text: A relaxing and enjoyable coffee time‚òï. Order a drink and get a bottle to draw freely.

name: Goodneighbor Cafe
review_1_text:
The cold drink was placed directly on the table without a coaster or tray, and the water flowed onto the table. I felt that there was a lack of basic serving consideration.
The response during the ordering process was somewhat dry, and there was a lack of guidance on additional requests, so the overall atmosphere was not comfortable.
The flavor and completeness of the food did not meet expectations for the price range. Compared to other stores with similar prices, it was difficult to feel any competitiveness.
review_2_text:
Once again, Google family...‚ù§Ô∏è

Upon traveling Thailand, my lady and I found this gem of a place. Smooth techno music, friendly staff, and the food was great. If youre looking for a place to chill/work or just simply be lazy with great breakfast, you won't regret spending your time here! First time here today and we will be back. See you soon üòä ‚ù§Ô∏è
review_3_text: Amazing and healthy food. Probably the best breakfast I had in Thailand. Highly recommend the a√ßai protein bowl, so yummy! The coffee is also high quality. I went there 3 times, and always I left with a smile. The staff are really kind and friendly. Great experience :)
review_4_text: Great place for breakfast. There is a big variety of smoothies and bowls. We came here a few times already and the food was great. The presentation is beautiful of both - food and drinks. Most importantly they are pet-friendly!
review_5_text:
It‚Äôs just great! Absolutely outstanding service and awesome food!
We had a bowl, sourdough with avocado and 2 salats for 4 pax and all of it was really good!
After that we had some take away protein shakes which taste awesome!

name: Beans of us Coffee Roaster
review_1_text: What a hidden lovely place. I tried the Thai-Ethiopian coffee blend with oat milk. Great natural high standard flavours and notes. I am picky about coffee, Ethiopian arabica coffee blends well with other regional beans, but it also tastes incredibly good without blending and adding nothing in it. The chocolate chip cookie was warm and fresh, I don't think I had something like this anywhere in Thailand so far. The lady at the coffee bar was nice and welcoming.
review_2_text: White tone is cold-brew coffee mixed with forest honey. It is absolutely refreshing. Definitely a perfect glass for hot weather day. The barista is friendly and professional. The atmosphere in the cafe is nice and the place is spacious which is absolutely for working or being a gathering place for chitchatting.
review_3_text: Great little coffee shop. Good coffee and nice little bakery items. Nice location. If sitting outside, it is a little noisy due to being right on a road. They let our small dog be with us in their outside seating.
review_4_text: This cafe has a really nice atmosphere, and the coffee was so good. I got a vanilla latte, and it was just what I wanted. It is also pet friendly, so you can bring your little puppy and enjoy your coffee and a snack.
review_5_text: I cam we here very early in the morning after my half marathon. So I was alone and the staff was still a bit sleepy. Not judging. I would be too if I had to work on a Sunday morning at 7am üòÖ I usually don‚Äôt like to have the first coffee of the day at a coffee shop since the machine is not up to speed. But I really needed one. And it was good.

name: Racha caftel ‡∏Ñ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏ü‡πà‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏û‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏à‡πá‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏≠‡∏î
review_1_text: Basic rooms but beds are super comfy.  Friendly staff, price reflects the value of the place. Great location, we found plenty of spots to eat around and right by a 7/11 and Lotus
review_2_text: Very affordable , well kept , relaxed and modern hotel. Staff are very accommodating and friendly. Hotel is not too far from the centre. Shops and atms within walking distance. I will definitely be back.
review_3_text: I lived here a few months. Staff is very friendly and rooms are great! (Pretty small but good for the price)
review_4_text: Efficient and affordable. 600 baht per night. We booked on the day and move in 2 hours later. Room is clean and as all the basics (AC, TV, Towels, Shower gel and Shampoo). The little coffeeshop near the reception is a us
review_5_text: I don't like the concept of sharing good reviews and getting free drinks, so the review you see from here, may not be real but just the people who get free drink.

name: Cherry Top 1994 Coffee & Bar
review_1_text: This is a great little bar!  Very attractive interior with proper amount of cocktail lighting, nice outdoor seating area too.  They make a great Manhattan, the King of Cocktails, and currently have a 2-1 drink special that is hard to beat.  Not far from old city, it's atmospheric and sexy with a classic vibe.  They have a full complement of cocktails.  I found it late in my stay in Chiang Mai but I'll be back!
review_2_text: Boutique and Beautiful. Fast thoughtful service and great decor and music. In the words of Arnie‚Ä¶I‚Äôll be back !!!
review_3_text: Nice atmosphere, great service and good music and food. And delicious cocktails.
review_4_text: Good atmosphere with super duper good taste of cocktails!!
review_5_text: Good service and sooo yummy!!

name: Cafƒìin
review_1_text: A lovely cat themed cafe (without actual cats). The barista was very friendly and made us delicious coffees. The almond croissant wasn't the tastiest I've had, but only because it wasn't overly sugary so for a good reason! You can even play good old Super Mario here üòÅ I highly recommend this place for the coffee! They have all sorts of cute little items, from Baby Yoda onwards. Such a sweet atmosphere. All the best to the owner ü´∞
review_2_text:
Cutesy little cafe around the street, with good wifi.
Latte is good!

I like coming here, just sit and relax. Sometimes work a bit, pretty quiet and not much ppl inside.
review_3_text: This cafe has a nice long table even though the space is small. The prices of the drinks are affordable and their coffee is dark roasted one and i felt lots of caffeine as the store name suggests.
review_4_text: A pretty good place to relax. Various types of coffees and beverages can be chosen. The Boss or staff is friendly. Recommend.
review_5_text:
This is the Best coffee shop in the district!
Super friendly owner, cozy interior and most cheap prices.
He also provides alternative milk. Fo free!! Extremely good combination of price and quality.
Worthy bakery üëç

name: ‡∏®‡∏∏‡∏Ç‡πñ‡πñ A BLISSFUL (Âπ∏Á¶èÂÖ≠ÂÖ≠ )‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏°‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏Ç Coffee and Craft
review_1_text: Decent to go coffee spot. They have lots of coffee gears and some of the beans from Kenya and Ethiopia.
review_2_text:
Small home cafe open to the road with few seats ‚òïÔ∏è
Good service & good coffee
Light & medium roasts with different origins
review_3_text:
It was near my accommodation, so I passed by often.
It's a bit out of the way, but it's always crowded.
Last time, I had an iced Yirgacheffe,
and thought I'd try a warm one next time I visit.
Today, I had a warm drip Yirgacheffe.
It was as delicious as I expected.
It's the best coffee I've had at a cafe in Thailand so far.
However, if you're used to coffees costing around 40 baht,
then 100 baht might be a bit much.
If it were in the Nimman area, it would probably be quite famous.
If you happen to pass by, I recommend stopping by.
review_4_text:
The coffee is excellent. Every menu item is a wonderful experience. The barista is skilled and understands how to create each unique drink. Come try it!

(Professional Barista with good coffee beans, every drink is perfect)
review_5_text:
An art studio and slow bar cafe with a dark, artsy atmosphere. The baristas present excellent coffee, and of course, it tastes great.

Come enjoy the flavors of coffee using the Flair Espresso machine and a variety of craft coffee equipment.

name: ‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å Coffee home
review_1_text:
This cozy little coffee shop is truly worth the short trip off the beaten path. It has that personal, welcoming feel that‚Äôs getting harder to find these days.
The food here is a standout, freshly made, and absolutely delicious. It‚Äôs not crowded with tourists, which helps the place keep its natural charm and relaxed atmosphere. I tried the pork rice bowl and highly recommend it; the flavor and quality were surprisingly good for such a humble setting.
I‚Äôll definitely be back to try more dishes. A real Chiang Mai gem!
review_2_text: Nice family run place to eat. A little bit of the beaten track but worth the visit. I had hoped to make it back‚Ä¶ next time I‚Äôm in town I‚Äôll go for sure.
review_3_text:
Great spot for food and coffee, the atmosphere is unique with vintage vehicles and retro technology and knickknacks all around. It is far from the road so there is no traffic. This appears to be their garden, where you are a guest; it really is a shop that feels like home.
Edit: a year later it is even better! The food is amazing üëè
review_4_text: Such a nice relaxing place with good food and great service. The lady here is super nice and welcoming and the space is comfortable and feels really great. They have nice home cooked meals aside from drinks, so you can plan to spend some time here if you wanna just sit back and relax for a bit.
review_5_text:
A retro delight. CDs and cassette, turntable. A menu of traditional cafe food, replete with some untypical additions. Delicious üëå.

Indoor and outdoor seating. Be careful walking on the moss-covered bricks outside when it rains!

name: The Re-Search Coffee Lab : ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≠‡∏∞ ‡∏£‡∏µ-‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ä ‡∏Ñ‡∏≠‡∏ü‡∏ü‡∏µ‡πà ‡πÅ‡∏•‡πá‡∏ö | Chiang Mai
review_1_text: This shrimp Pad Thai was absolutely delicious. The noodles were perfectly cooked. not too dry or soggy. with a fragrant aroma. The shrimp were fresh and generously sized, and the flavor was well-balanced without needing any extra seasoning. You can really taste the care put into this dish. Highly recommended for Pad Thai lovers.
review_2_text: The shrimp Pad Thai was tasty with well-cooked noodles and fresh shrimp. The price was affordable for the quality, and the food was served quickly without a long wait. A good option if you‚Äôre looking for a quick, tasty, and reasonably priced Thai dish.
review_3_text: Very nice place! Good menu selection, great atmosphere! Friendly staff.
review_4_text: This is a little hidden gem‚Ä¶beautiful little cafe with lovely owner. I had the fresh orange juice, which was really yummy, not too sweet‚Ä¶perfect!! My friends had smoothies which looked amazing and they said were really delicious. Will definitely be back to try more things. They also do some good imported beers too! üëçüèº
review_5_text: A very quaint little Cafe and coffee shop, located near the old Chinese cemetery. A large selection of mixed fruit juices, smoothies, and coffees were on the menu, although almost exclusively in Thai, I found that I didn't really have a issue finding what I wanted on this really hot day. The owner even had a small selection of exotic beers, like IPA's and Hefe Wisen's. This little spot is worth your time to investigate!

name: ‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏ô ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≠‡∏∞ ‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡πå ‡∏Ñ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏ü‡πà ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≤ ‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏™‡πÇ‡∏ã‡πà ‡πÄ‡∏à‡πá‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏≠‡∏î
review_1_text: Many branches of this coffee shop in the north, nice coffee beans they use üëç
review_2_text: Great coffee with reasonable price.
review_3_text: The coffee shop at the gas station is affordable, the taste is decent, there's parking available, and the staff provides good service.
review_4_text: Delicious, not expensive, good service, parking at a gas station, reasonable price.
review_5_text: It's delicious. I'm happily waiting for the car to be washed.

name: GULP‚Äôs Cafe
review_1_text: It is rare for me to see a manual lever espresso machine, especially since I live in Italy. The staff are always welcoming and greet you kindly, even if you do not speak Thai ‚ù§Ô∏è
review_2_text: Very good drinks. I had a cold Thai tea which was delicious and my girlfriend had a cold matcha which was also very good. We recommend this cafe for a drink. The only downside is that there are very few tables (2 I think) but that seems to be common around here.
review_3_text: Cute shop, good atmosphere, delicious pure matcha.
review_4_text: We have coffee beans available in every processing stage, at good prices. Light roast is 65 baht.
review_5_text:
I came across this cafe by chance while taking a walk.
I had a cappuccino and a latte.
They were both delicious!
The interior was clean and the staff were friendly.

name: the bliss kitchen
review_1_text: Cute little cafe, hidden down the end of a quiet street, with a small menu and limited outdoor seating. Great coffee, delicious food and tasty bakery items too, fresh out of the oven! All to a wonderfully chilled soundtrack playing in the background and super sweet owner/staff!! ü•∞
review_2_text: Great spot to relax with a coffee or grab a sandwich. Cozy atmosphere, friendly service, and the prices are very reasonable. Definitely a nice place to unwind or catch up with a friend.
review_3_text:
Nice little cafe. Reasonably priced but I found my americano to be a little watery.
Good service.
I wish they had a bathroom, though.
review_4_text:
Five Stars for Charm, Coffee, and a Truly Magical Experience! ‚ú®

I stumbled upon this little gem in Chiang Rai, and I'm so glad I did! From the moment I stepped inside, I was captivated.  The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern comfort. But what truly sets this coffee shop apart is the owner.  She's absolutely enchanting ‚Äì warm, welcoming, and radiating a genuine kindness that immediately puts you at ease. Her smile is infectious, and her easygoing nature makes you feel like you've known her for years.

Beyond the captivating owner, the coffee and Thai iced tea are exceptional! The coffee is rich, aromatic, and perfectly brewed.  The Thai iced tea is the best I've had in Thailand ‚Äì perfectly balanced, creamy, and intensely flavorful.  It's clear that only the highest quality ingredients are used.

This isn't just a coffee shop; it's an experience. It's a place where you can relax, unwind, and soak in the charming atmosphere while enjoying delicious drinks.  The owner's warmth and hospitality add an extra layer of magic, making it a truly unforgettable spot.  If you're in Chiang Rai, you absolutely MUST visit this hidden treasure!  You won't regret it.  I can't wait to go back!  ‚òïüáπüá≠üíñ
review_5_text: Great place which great coffee come  with great note taste(mostly are nutty).the owner share her passion on coffee and second hand clothes about affordable price you can every day buy hers that make you will be back again

name: Chubboy Coffee - ‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏≠‡∏ü‡∏ü‡∏µ‡πà
review_1_text: Chubboy coffee is 11/10. I had it everyday for 2 months. It‚Äôs hard to find a good caramel macchiato that taste like back home (US) but this place has it! They can adjust the sweetness for you. It‚Äôs a large size for only ‡∏ø50 and only ‡∏ø10 for an extra shot of espresso. Him and his mother are soo sweet and good genuine people. review_2_text: Perfect Coffey by low price!
review_3_text: Great chocolate, and good lattes for little cost
review_4_text: Good
review_5_text:
Chubboy Cafe - Chubboy Cafe is a coffee shop in Chiang Mai with a unique and distinctive style. This time, I ordered drinks through the Foodpanda app and was extremely impressed with the speed of delivery and, most importantly, the generous discounts. It was even better value than I expected. I ordered the Iced Cocoa and Iced Matcha Latte. The flavors were rich, just the right amount of sweet, and not at all cloying. The cocoa had a distinct aroma, while the matcha gave a refreshing, Japanese-inspired feel. I didn't want to put my cup down. The packaging was cute and the attention to detail was excellent. Even with delivery, the quality remained excellent.

If you're in Chiang Mai or looking for a cafe with great drinks, excellent service, and reasonable prices, Chubboy Cafe is a must-try. You won't be disappointed. Especially if you find a discount code on Foodpanda, it will be even more worth it.

Okay so I ordered from Chubboy Cafe on Foodpanda the other day and damn, it was way better than I expected. Got a crazy good discount, like almost half-off kind of deal. I got an iced cocoa and iced matcha‚Äîboth were bomb. The cocoa was super rich and smooth, not too sweet. And the matcha? Bro, it tasted like a straight-up Tokyo caf√© moment. So good.

Even the packaging was cute, like they actually put effort into it even though it was just delivery. If you‚Äôre in Chiang Mai and craving something cold and tasty without breaking the bank, def check out Chubboy. And if you catch a discount on Foodpanda? Say less. Worth it 100%.

There is an art gallery on the second floor, which is a nice concept, but unfortunately the space feels quite cluttered and messy, with boxes and items stored around. This sense of disorder is noticeable in other parts of the caf√© as well. If the gallery and surrounding areas were organized and cleaned up, this could become a really great place.

I didn‚Äôt quite enjoy the coffee, but that‚Äôs a matter of personal taste. Overall, the caf√© has good potential.

The prices are higher than most of the cakes in town, but they are well worth it.

The coffee here is really good, and the space is large with plenty of seating, making it perfect whether you‚Äôre coming alone for a quiet cup or with a big group of friends. The atmosphere is comfortable and welcoming.

The shop is still new, and soon they‚Äôll also be serving bakery items, which will make it an even better spot to relax. Definitely a great addition for both hotel guests and anyone in the area looking for good coffee in a spacious setting!

name: The Baristro x Ping River
review_1_text: A riverside caf√© by the Ping River with a spacious area and plenty of seating, both indoor and outdoor. There are many photo spots, and it‚Äôs also a convenient place to work since there are power outlets available. They offer a wide selection of coffee beans‚Äîfrom light, medium, to dark roast‚Äîand they have their own roastery. There‚Äôs also a slow bar for matcha and green tea lovers. A great spot that‚Äôs sure to please both coffee enthusiasts and matcha fans.
review_2_text: Visited at lunchtime and not too busy and great value overall. Loved the soft matcha (my favorite in Chiang Mai!) and the easygoing vibe. Plenty of space to work or relax by the Ping River. Only downside: wifi drops in some rooms. Still friendly staff and I‚Äôd definitely return.
review_3_text: A peaceful and nice place to sit and relax on the riverside. The atmosphere is excellent and there are many aesthetic photo spots. There are plenty of parking spaces available. The drinks are delicious with reasonable prices, but a little disappointment is they can‚Äôt deliver your drink order to your table which is a minus point for me because usually I can order up to 2 drinks after I finished with the first one.
review_4_text: The atmosphere of the restaurant is excellent, with multiple zones to choose from. The outdoor zone offers a river view and great fresh air. The indoor area is comfortably air-conditioned. The restaurant provides different moods in one place, with plenty of parking available. The drinks are delicious.

Drinks are around 70‚Äì80, desserts about 90, pretty reasonable. In the evening, there‚Äôs a nice DJ set. It feels more like visiting a friend‚Äôs home than a typical caf√©. A great spot to relax, read, or get some work done.

Interior design is very unique.
The price is reasonable.
review_3_text: trying a chocolate mint for the first time and it is delicious. cute little place, love the cups, cutie dog with heterochromia
review_4_text: Doggy heaven, I enjoyed my cheese toast and loved the vibe of the places. People are very warm and welcoming! Will be back!!
review_5_text: Great place and super friendly owners. We feel right at home. Great food and coffee. And they also sell selective stuff too. Highly recommended!

name: Caf√© Amazon
review_1_text: I recently visited a new Cafe Amazon with two floors. The air conditioning was wonderfully cool, creating a perfect atmosphere to relax. However, the staff seemed a bit unfriendly, which slightly dampened the overall experience.
review_2_text:
This is a new location for cafe Amazon that just opened. It has 2 floors, indoor and outdoor seatings. Lots of coffee, tea choices and lots of snacks.

Place is big inside, people come here to work on laptops and meet in person.
review_3_text: Always an excellent outlet to visit to fulfill your coffee cravings üòã. Very friendly staff with good atmosphere and they are always helpful.
review_4_text: Excellent large cafe, 2 floors with soft sofas, an ideal, comfortable place to work with a laptop
review_5_text: Usual roadside services with a cute kids toilet

name: The Thaiger Coffee
review_1_text: Great place for nice coffee.   Cool vintage Thai movie posters on the walls. Pleasant staff.  Recommended.
review_2_text: Nicely decorated, lovely Team, refreshing Honey Lemon Soda
review_3_text:
I stumbled upon this coffee shop and restaurant on my way. I looked in because they had such a wide selection of teas, and I realized they also serve steak.

I was happy to be able to enjoy a generous portion of protein and vegetables at a reasonable price. The coffee was also very strong and delicious. I'm leaving after enjoying my meal!
review_4_text: All the menus on the roadside are really cheap, the food is clean and tasty, and the coffee is even better than Starbucks.
review_5_text: The coffee is delicious, they use high-quality ingredients. It's also very affordable at only 35 baht per cup. The food is delicious too, everything on the menu is tasty. The owner is lovely, very kind and always smiling. I'm a regular customer now!

name: SPACE and TIME
review_1_text: Best matcha latte in town! The owner draws her own cup for each customer. What a creative!
review_2_text:
Nice, smaller cafe, owner is very welcoming! Price is great, cup art is amazing too!
I got an iced Americano to go
review_3_text: Adorable cafe with cool decoration and a pleasant atmosphere. Has a good selection of special drinks as well.
review_4_text: love it!

name: ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ä‡∏≤ ‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≥‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ä‡∏≤‡∏õ‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡πå‡πÉ‡∏ï‡πâ ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
review_1_text: Ordered Thai tea and got wrong size and they refused to correct their mistake
review_2_text: One of the best iced cappuccinos had in üáπüá≠. The ice - hot chocolate was super nice too! Highly recommend üòã
review_3_text: Best Thai Tea and bubble tea shop
review_4_text: A southern tea shop with strong, delicious tea and good coffee. They have both medium and dark roasts to choose from. The menu is extremely diverse. I usually order delivery to my office. They pack it very well. The shop provides good service and is attentive.
review_5_text:
The Southern Thai tea is very strong and perfectly sweet. It's a flavor you don't need to ask for less or more sugar.
They have a variety of menu items, and the shop can separate the tea from the ice.
Highly recommended!!! Free delivery for 5 glasses in the nearby area.

name: TARUKA ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≤ ‡∏õ‡∏ï‡∏ó. ‡∏ü‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Æ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏°
review_1_text: The Taiwanese tea is so fragrant! The fruit tea is also refreshing. It tastes amazing with cream cheese! I'll definitely go back again when I'm in the area. ü•∞

name: MIZU Cafe in car
review_1_text: Super nice coffee at a great price
review_2_text: Good coffee at good price
review_3_text: I've encountered this more than 2-3 times. I ordered one drink and waited for more than 10 minutes. In the end, I canceled the order. I waited longer and was afraid I wouldn't make it to work in time. And more than 4-5 times, I drove and there was no parking. Okay, that's it.
review_4_text:
Very good coffee and Taiwanese milk tea!
The staff are super friendly and very quick with orders, and the prices are absolutely reasonable for the size. They offer two different coffee roasts, which you can choose from.
I love coming here and highly recommend it!
review_5_text: The iced tea was very delicious. The staff had long eyelashes and a stern face, not really ready to serve customers. But I forgive them because the iced tea is the best in Chiang Mai and very strong. However, some days when I order it, there are a lot of tea scraps.

name: ‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏£‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏¥‡∏• ‡∏Ñ‡∏≠‡∏ü‡∏ü‡∏µ‡πà ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≤ ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ã‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏™‡πá‡∏á
review_1_text: Very delicious. Good service, polite speech, good atmosphere.
review_2_text: Good service, great taste.
review_3_text: If you want to know, you have to try.

name: Cornhole cafe
review_1_text: Such a homely wholesome vibe, they have a selection of over 20 craft sodas, great coffee, can play cornhole, the owners are so sweet and welcoming can mix with Thai and English such a refreshing different experience in Chiang Mai ‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: Taste of Art
review_1_text:
This is one of my favorite spots in Chiang Mai! The spaghetti is cooked perfectly every time, the bagels are fantastic, and the coffee is top quality. The atmosphere is warm, and the staff are super friendly and incredibly attentive.

What I appreciate the most is how dog-friendly they are. Not only do they welcome dogs, but they always treat my dog like a little princess ‚Äî it‚Äôs truly heartwarming.

If you‚Äôre looking for great food, great coffee, and genuinely kind service, this is the place to be! üíõüê∂‚ú®

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Highly Recommended!
review_2_text:
One of my favorite places in Chiang Mai! It was my go-to spot in 2023, and I‚Äôm back again in 2025.

The environment is lovely, with a cute little garden. The coffee is great, the staff are friendly, and the prices are reasonable. The food is delicious as well. It can get a bit busy in the late morning, but it‚Äôs totally worth it!
review_3_text:
What a gem! So peaceful and quiet. Big difference from the Old City. Delicious coffee. Salmon for the salmon, avocado, scrambled egg & caper bagel was perfect fresh.

Cute coffee mugs. Friendly staff. Greenery. Fresh air. Super intimate coffee spot ‚ú®
review_4_text: Such a lovely place! Everything was so tasty, the atmosphere was amazing, and the staff were super friendly. We had a really great time here! Perfect Coffe ‚ù§Ô∏è
review_5_text:
There is a wide variety of beverages available, especially coffee that is roasted in-house, offering many choices.
The breakfast is very tasty and reasonably priced.
The staff provide excellent and friendly service, and they are able to communicate in English.
Parking available.

name: Looper Wave
review_1_text: This complex of swimming pool, onsen, and caf√© is a great place to relax. The spacious pool is divided into lanes, with a hot tub and a cold stone bath nearby. There are quite a lot of signs informing visitors about the rules in this area. On the second floor, there‚Äôs a cozy caf√© with great coffee. The prices are reasonable, and the service is good.
review_2_text:
Looper Wave is more than just a swimming pool‚Äîit‚Äôs also a great caf√© with a modern, chill vibe. Through large glass windows, you can enjoy views of the pool while sipping coffee.

The barista, with extensive latte competition experience, delivers exceptional latte art.

Creative coffee options, especially the peanut-infused one, are a must-try. Highly recommended!
review_3_text:
This review is strictly for the cafe itself, not the pool/onsen.

Forget about going here to work. Probably not even to hang out and chill. Plenty of other places for that. It's clearly not the place for either.
I don't think it even knows what it wants to be. It's really dark and loud, in stark contrast to the entire property around it. Plus it doesn't serve food!

This cafe really should be redesigned to complement the pool/ "onsen" business.

The chairs are super uncomfortable, and the tables are tiny.
The music was very loud too, and the Cafe had most of its blinds down so they can play some really out of place cartoon projected onto the wall. No idea what they are thinking.

I got the "energy" smoothie which was absolutely terrible. It was really small for the price (120, +20 for almond milk,) and it came out as a thick slush that you need a spoon for (which they didn't give). It tasted like a bag of cacao blended with a couple ice cubes. Pretty gross and not what was expected.

Hard pass on this place. Wifi was good and nice view of the pool though.
review_4_text: Good decoration and vibe but not a place to work because loud music (good for chilling) and uncomfortable chair. Btw, the coffee is not good as expected (by this price) and the staff is really not warm welcome ‚Ä¶ maybe she had a bad morning before going to work at the caf√©. I really have no idea that it is not allow to wait outside before 10am. (bad air pollution then need to find some free space to sit and wait). Once the staff arrived and saw me sitting on the 2nd floor, she was frustrated and spoke to me with negative attitude like I would steal or break sth. by just sitting in front of the cafe‚Ä¶ but honestly no sign at the G floor not to go upstair before 10am‚Ä¶who is gonna know? Better sit by the pool if the weather is nice. üò¢
review_5_text: Excellent cafe. I am the first one to review. It is amazing. Great pool next to it. I will come back!! Thank you.

name: Toki Coffee est. 1968
review_1_text: Sound from Galyani Vadhana. Good coffee here with a story of the Pakakayor hill tribe. I also love the new drink on the menu, cascara lemon tea. The owner is nice and loves to share his own coffee journey as an expat. I use the phrase ‚Äúsound from Galyani Vadhana‚Äù because he is a young man who brings his products from his district to town, so for me it feels like the sound of his district when I have a sip of his coffee.
review_2_text:
Had came for a car wash, which Toki Coffee was within the compound.
Ordered a Matcha Green Tea & Lemon Tea for ourselves.
Young boss felt that the first green tea he made was not up to his standard, therefore prepared another cup which was free of charge. Great pride in his service & product. Thumbs up to him!!! üòÄ
review_3_text:
Made an excellent coffee to order at second attempt!
Balance of body and citrus.Smooth.
Medium roast .Natural process
review_4_text: A very cozy and relax establishing to enjoy a nice cup of coffee. It was run by a Karen family and the owner took great care to brew a cup of coffee. Would be back again.
review_5_text: Very good coffee and very warm welcome service. Natural and honey drip coffee are highly recommended.

name: DAS COFFEE
review_1_text: They use real cups instead of plastic ones which is good. The inside is ac and the outside is spacious with comfortable chairs. Two cappuccino's for 100thb. Friendly barista.
review_2_text: Coffee: 45 Baht. Ambient small cafe' with great coffee and a friendly owner. Individual tables which are good for laptops/reading. A small outside/roadside area has tables and permits smoking (for those that do).
review_3_text: Terrible ! I went almost all coffee shops near here. This coffee shop is the most unkind. I spilled a little water in toilet and smoking ashes outside. The owner came to me ‚Äú you‚Äôre not welcome, you‚Äôre dirty‚Äù. I think the saying is rude but I apologized politely several times. But she came again and repeated again. She needs totally clean space , why she‚Äôs running the coffee shop ? Coffee shop should provide coffee but also good services. The staffs were also unkind and they don‚Äôt clean often. Sometimes I clean the left coffee cups and trashes and returned the tray. They never say Thank you. They just always see the phones. Even this coffee shop don‚Äôt keep the business hour. They are very lazy, never seen that it‚Äôs open in the business hour they post. They should change the time or make a notice to customers. That‚Äôs why this coffee shop don‚Äôt have many customers in this village. In Chiangmai, this coffee shop is the worst coffee shop that I‚Äôve gone. They don‚Äôt respect customers at all.
review_4_text: Friendly stuff, good aircondition and delicious latte for only 45baht
review_5_text: Best cappuccino in Town

name: Inthanin Coffee ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≤‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ú‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å
review_1_text:
‚òï Inthanin Coffee ‚Äì Chang Phueak Branch

Stopped by this cozy caf√© on a relaxing day and absolutely loved the atmosphere. The shop offers both indoor air-conditioned seating and a breezy outdoor area surrounded by greenery üåø ‚Äî perfect for working or just unwinding with a cup of coffee.

The coffee was aromatic and flavorful, with quality that exceeded the price. Staff were polite, friendly, and always ready with a smile üòä.
There‚Äôs convenient parking available, which is a big plus if you‚Äôre driving üöó.

Whether you‚Äôre just passing by or looking for a peaceful spot to recharge, I highly recommend visiting this branch. It‚Äôs the kind of place where you can sip slowly, breathe easy, and enjoy a moment of calm with a shot of caffeine üíö
review_2_text:
‚òï Inthanin Coffee, Chang Phueak Branch
Stop by for a relaxing coffee on a chill day. This shop has seating both inside (air-conditioned) and outside. The coffee has a wonderful aroma and great taste, with mid-range prices that offer excellent value for money.
The staff are polite, friendly, and welcoming. Plus, there's convenient parking. üöó If you're passing by this area, I highly recommend stopping by. You can chill out and get a caffeine boost! üíö
review_3_text: Anyone who's been to this branch should try the San Sai branch (Sam Yaek Market 8143). You'll notice a huge difference in seating, service, and care. You have to go! Try it and you'll understand what warm, welcoming service is like. "You are important" isn't just a greeting.
review_4_text: The coffee is delicious...the staff provides excellent service; everyone is polite and courteous. There's no long wait, there are many new menu items, the seating is spacious, clean, and quiet.
review_5_text: I like the quiet atmosphere...it's comfortable to work there, and the staff provides good service. Today they recommended a good promotion.

name: ‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏° ‡πÄ‡∏à‡πá‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏≠‡∏î HAPPY TASTY ‡∏°‡∏∞‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏≠‡∏° ‡∏™‡∏î ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏• 100%
review_1_text: Walking into the store already knowing their products are going to be very good since the space is well organized and every corner is cleaned and well detailed. The guy is a true professional and I can tell he does not skip any layer of the processes to make it easier and making sure he makes effort to make it really good. I think this place and the guy is special, so you need to come check it out. Highly recommended.
review_2_text:
Nicely decorated store.
I ordered ice cream with sweet bun. The shop owner gives us a donut. All are very good.
Highly recommended.
review_3_text: This is just so good. We came here not in purpose but just passed by for a coffee. Their thai tea latte is so good and the owner was so kind to provide a refill of itü§£ We also ordered the coconut ice cream with taro pearl and it tasted soooo good too. The vibe here was so relaxing that we felt so sleepy haha. The owner was so polite and kind and generous. üòä
review_4_text: Delicious and friendly owner. Would definitely come back again
review_5_text: It was really good! The owner was really nice and gave us lots of delicious freebies :)

name: ‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏∞‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ß ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ô (‡∏ï‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ó‡∏û‡∏°‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏•) - SDCoconut Smoothies Changkian
review_1_text: the coconut coffees here are SO good, it's nice that you can customize your sweetness level :) and the cashier when I went was very cute and helpful!!
review_2_text:
Amazing place for drinks! I had the coconut milk cocoa frappe and it was the best drink I‚Äôve had since being in Thailand.
My partner had the coconut espresso frappe and his was equally as good. The staff are lovely too, highly recommend!!
review_3_text: I had their coconut ice cream in a coconut. I was surprised there were three big scoops of coconut ice cream plus lots of coconut meat inside the coconut. It was delicious and super filling. The price was very reasonable at 40 baht. Their espresso was strong too!
review_4_text: The best coconut ice cream in the world! They also have some drinks like smoothies and coffee.
review_5_text: Ice cream is delicious.

name: Good Drink Good Cups at Chang Khian
review_1_text: The drinks taste good and the shop is cute.

name: GET AWAKE CAFE
review_1_text: Nice little pace by a large residence to work from its nestled in the heart of the university area.  I ordered the get awake coffee which is basically like a milk coffee but it was pretty damn strong so it lived up to its name!  Place just has some ceiling fans to keep cool and there‚Äôs no power outlets for charging your phone.  Still a nice place to work from. #BeatTheGrind
review_2_text: everything else was great but that owner lady excuse us for bringing other's shop drink into hers, which we DID NOT. we bought snacks from the shop that has the same owner and he said we can sit there (as long as we purchase something of course) so we did. so,, ?????
review_3_text: New shop, great atmosphere. Filled with university students.
review_4_text: Just drop here. Google maps says it is open, but it is closed. Update your information!
review_5_text: Mini cafe, hot and cold drinks, consumer goods are available at Get Zleep Premium budjet hotel.

name: PAZZY BAR ‡πÅ‡∏û‡∏ó‡∏ã‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ö‡∏≤‡∏£‡πå
review_1_text: Pazzy Bar is a super cute small cafe, mostly catering to local Uni students. Seating is limited, so it's best for takeaway coffee or for sitting quietly. The coffee is great, and the retro decorations and cat-theme is so fun and inviting. Ice coffee is 45 Baht and there are lots of small snacks including handmade bakery items. The owner is lovely. üå∏üòä
review_2_text:
If you come to this Cafe,You will find a lot of Architecture and Interior Design students,Teacher ETC.
The owner so cute and friendly.She can speak every language whatever you want,Especially Japanese
Bakery this shop daaa BESTü§ç
review_3_text: Great blend at an affordable price compared to Nimman's area, and I believe this is the best around the campus area in the front zone of CMU/CMRU. I recommend it to those who want to taste coffee without any fancy or elaborate stuff‚Äîjust great taste and passion in beans. I highly suggest you try it.
review_4_text: The coffee is very nice and the coffee shop is very cute and cozy. I recommend this place!!
review_5_text: Super chill and cute üê±cat cafe, amazing coffee and tea.

name: AUI-D Coffee
review_1_text: A newly opened tiny cafe. They are doing buy 2 get 1 free in the morning. The quality of the coffee is decent. If you just get one cup, the prices are a bit higher than many similar tiny cafes in this area. The space is really small so it‚Äôs better to just get a to go.
review_2_text: Small store. Coffee beans are available with medium and dark roast.
review_3_text: So delicious food & reasonable price & very kind host. Thanks!
review_4_text: Cute and cozy cafe. The owner is friendly and greets you with a welcoming smile. If you're in the area, I recommend stopping by this brand new cafe!

name: Sudkhum cafe & Restaurant
review_1_text:
Amazing place, cosy.

Perfect service.

Delicious food and fair prices.
review_2_text:
This is so cosy nice place.
We like to be here.
And staff is very friendly. And food so tasty :)
Thank you so much.
review_3_text: Everything was good. I got the spicy pork spaghetti, chicken nuggets, French fries and a banana smoothie.
review_4_text: Very tasty food in a spacious, pleasant setting and they make their own ice cream!
review_5_text: Truly worth it, truly worth the price. The food is delicious and the portions are generous. The drinks and desserts are also delicious. The waffles are the best, soft and just the right amount of sweet. The atmosphere is good, air-conditioned, and there are plenty of power outlets. It's perfect for chilling out or working. If you're looking for a cafe with drinks, desserts, and food, this place is the place for you. I highly recommend it.

name: Smile Coffe 2
review_1_text: A small cafe with good drinks. I picked up ice cappuccino here and it was pretty good. The is a few chairs, but the space is tiny, so it‚Äôs probably best for many to just get it to go.
review_2_text:
Not a fancy place but good coffee at a great price. Great little coffee shop if you live in the local area and want a caffeine or soft drink fix.
As I'm a fairly regular customer I take in my own washable cup and straw to save waste on plastic. Owner is happy to put drinks in your own container, if you want to do the same.
Street side setting. ..so expect passing local traffic.
review_3_text: Khun Taro is one of the nicest people you will meet in Chiang Mai and his coffee is delicious
review_4_text: Cozy little coffee shop with great location in Ban Chang Khian. I discovered it as it was close to several laundromats in the area. Great coffee at a reasonable price is one of the reasons I keep coming back. They also have a small selection of cookies and pastries.
review_5_text: Great coffee in a great neighborhood. Always super friendly, great atmosphere.

name: ON THE WAY CAFE CHIANG MAI @ CHANG KHIAN
review_1_text:
Small 2-3 stools
EXPRESSO machine
Really Cafe latte for  35 baht
They make  expresso based flavored ICED drinks add 10 baht per extra ingredient.
review_2_text: The coffee is really good, and the people who make it do it well.

name: nonuou cafe
review_1_text: Found a great coffee shop with friendly prices! I ordered an oat latte for only 50 baht, and it tasted amazing for the price. The shop has a minimalist design, comfortable seating, and a lovely view of Doi Suthep mountain.
review_2_text: This is a coffee shop with a hostel located above it. The interior is cozy and charming, with a comfortable atmosphere perfect for relaxing and enjoying the view of Doi Suthep. The coffee is delicious and reasonably priced ‚Äì excellent value for money.
review_3_text: A cute shop with fresh coffee and matcha.

name: ALL TWO COFFEE BAR
review_1_text: cool

name: PK HOUSE Cafe
review_1_text: Very friendly service, tasty mango and milk frapp√© and a cute Pomeranian dog!
review_2_text: The desserts and food are soooooo delicious! Everything!

name: Sunshine Coffee Cup
review_1_text: Excellent coffee and service in a pleasant environment at a fair price. Highly recommend.
review_2_text: The coffee and juice at this cafe are delicious; I highly recommend them.
review_3_text: A convenient spot right next to the hotel for a coffee and a bite to eat. The lady was very friendly, and the place looks very clean and pretty. I don't understand why it doesn't have any reviews yet; I don't know if it's because it's new.

name: Arte House
review_1_text: The owner speaks English and Chinese fluently as well as Thai. She seems to love her little cozy oasis and the customers who come. Such a kind soul.
review_2_text: This was Chiang Mai's first accommodation. Breakfast was so delicious and the cafe was beautiful. The accommodation was not soundproof, but it didn't bother me much during the stay. The owner and the woman we work with were so kind that I would like to visit again next time. üôÇ
review_3_text: Stayed there for 4 nights and booked it based on the reviews that the place is very clean. The owners were friendly and were very nice to upgrade my booking to a room with balcony, however I wish the cleanliness level and overall the state of the room would have been better. The amenities are basic, the shower together with the toilet was very small. On the plus size the location is central to old Chiang Mai town and there are some great coffee shops around. Definitely a place for someone on a budget and someone who doesn‚Äôt expect too much comfort from their lodging.
review_4_text:
Perfect. Really perfect. The owner and staff are welcoming and full of attention.
The room was super big, really comfortable, nicely decorated and furnished. This place really has a good atmosphere with the coffee shop on the GF and the garden were you can read and take a tasty breakfast.
Location is a bit outside of the city center in a pleasant area.
It is like a charming bed & breakfast and clearly the opposite of these boring hotel and resort without soul
review_5_text: We stayed 4 nights here and we absolutely loved it! We had a beautiful and cozy room with balcony. It was big enough and very clean. Owners are very nice and always ready to help. We got complimentary drinking water all the time, they booked a taxi for us for the way back to the airport, and gave us many tips on where to eat and what we definitely need to see in Chiang Mai. We would definitely stay there again!

name: 2STREETCOFFEECREW
review_1_text: Chill vibes central in Chiang Mai! Sipped on a creamy matcha latte that was pure green goodness‚Äîsmooth, not too sweet, with that perfect frothy top‚Äîwhile sinking into the cozy nook, lost in the great background music weaving mellow tunes through the air. Ideal spot for unwinding and letting the day melt away.
review_2_text:
After the rain
A cup of hot latte is just what you need.
The coffee shop around the corner is very distinctive, and the staff are warm and sweet.
The coffee beans are amazing. The medium-roast flavor is very rich, and the acidity is just right. It's mellow and has a long aftertaste. I'll definitely visit often.
review_3_text: You can choose the roast level and each cup is carefully made. It‚Äôs one of the popular coffee pick up spots in this area. My light roast americano was good.
review_4_text: Best coffee in Chiang Mai! Regular coffee stop with great staff and very good coffee. The cafe has a great vibe, with a friendly team who are always happy to see you. Highly recommend 2StreetCoffeeCrew. Love it here.
review_5_text:
One of my favourite coffee spots in Chiang Mai. Amazing coffee, the best staff, wonderful vibe.

Just a joyous spot to hang out for a coffee solo or meet a friend.

Must visit destination when in Chiang Mai.

name: Twenty T Coffee Cafe
review_1_text: After over 2 years in Thailand, it's rare to find such diverse coffee beans! This 10„é° shop carries global varieties ‚Äì from commercial blends to single-origin beans. Truly amazed how this tiny space holds a coffee universe. A must-visit for coffee lovers!
review_2_text: Delicious and special coffee. I saw coffee beans here that I haven't seen anywhere else in Thailand. Definitely recommend and I will definitely come back next timeüëçüèΩüëèüèΩ
review_3_text:
Productwise, it is best coffee in the neighborhood!
The owners are amongst the nicest people I've met, although I don't speak tha√Ø that much they always try and talk to me. I always feel welcome here.
When you add to it the warmest and coziest atmosphere with some of the cutest cats you get this incredible place!
A little hidden gem!
review_4_text: After few months in chiang mai and visiting so many different coffee shops i can say i finally found the best coffee and the best shop in chiang mai. Staff very friendly and polite, coffee it self as i said the best one. They have something for everybodys taste.
review_5_text: The best coffee in Chiang Mai no doubt, small local business with a varaity of local coffee beans, the service is amazing too, recommend!

name: ‡∏à‡∏á‡∏ä‡∏á‡∏î‡∏µ ‡∏ä‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ï‡πâ - ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏à‡πá‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏≠‡∏î
review_1_text: The southern tea is fragrant, the cocoa is strong and satisfying, everything is delicious, and the price is not expensive. The lady who served me was polite and gave good advice.
review_2_text: The tea is very strong and delicious. There is a lot of parking space. Many cars can park there.

name: ‡∏ä‡∏π‡∏®‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏õ‡πå ‡∏Ñ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏ü‡πà chusilp cafe
review_1_text:
Cute spot, nearby a university and had nice air conditioning!

I ordered two iced mochas to go (45 baht each), and was given an easy to carry bag for this purpose. Price is good, strong WiFi, bathroom access (outside) and decent service. Also tasty coffee!

Would recommend!
review_2_text:
Super cute little shop with solid coffee, great prices, and awesome barista.

Hope this places gets poppin! Come support ~
review_3_text: It's a cafe right next to our apartment, so I went to this cafeüòÄI was worried because there was no review, but I am leaving a review because the coffee tastes really greatüëçüëçThe price is cheap and the coffee is so good. It's the best latte I've ever had in Chiang Mai!
review_4_text: Good small Caf√© with great coffee. Definitely recommend.
review_5_text: The coffee was delicious and it was fun to read the post-it notes on the wall. It was enjoyable.

name: ‡∏ä‡∏≤‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏Å ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≤ 2 (‡∏™‡∏π‡∏ï‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ß)
review_1_text: The shop offers Thai tea at the affordable price of 25 ‡∏ø and is conveniently situated near the local road. It is known for its diverse beverage selection, which makes it a popular choice among the local community. While the offerings are appealing, the staff's lack of smiles and perceived unfriendliness during my visit was somewhat disappointing. I would have gladly returned if the staff had been more welcoming, but unfortunately, this experience has led me to believe that this will be my final visit.
review_2_text: Delicious brewed coffee, generous portions üëçüèª

name: ‡∏Ñ‡∏ì‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≤‡πÅ‡∏ü ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
review_1_text: Good Cafe
review_2_text: üëçüèªMatcha Coconut, Americano Coconut, very refreshing. You get a whole coconut for 88‡∏ø.

name: One by one coffee
review_1_text: Small coffee shop at the same place with the noodle shop. It's very comfortable to take some grandma's noodles and a cap of coffee for breakfast!
review_2_text: The prices are cheap and the drinks taste good. I recommend buying a drink here and also trying the noodles, as they're in the same shop. It's like killing two birds with one stone!
review_3_text: The latte here is very delicious. I recommend you to come and buy it. Order the noodles too, they are very delicious.
review_4_text: This coffee shop is a small, affordable cafe that's popular with young people and students who don't have much money.
review_5_text: The drink is delicious and not overly sweet. There's also a noodle shop next door. Very early in the morning. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: Wild Coffee & Bistro
review_1_text:
This coffee shop is an absolute must-visit. The coffee is exceptional, and the atmosphere is incredibly serene and relaxing. However, I have a minor complaint about the food menu. Instead of offering a Thai-inspired brunch menu with a focus on proteins like eggs, they have western dishes such as steak and pasta, along with some Thai dishes. Additionally, some music would enhance the overall experience.
Overall, solid place to grab some coffee and enjoy the natural surroundings.
review_2_text: Lovely caf√© with a beautiful natural atmosphere and plenty of cozy seating areas. However, the service could be improved ‚Äî the staff seemed unwelcoming, and some tables were not cleaned despite few customers. Such a shame, as the place itself is truly charming and has great potential.
review_3_text: This is a cafe with a beautiful view, surrounded by beautiful nature. The prices of drinks and food are quite reasonable for a cafe. However, when I went, I felt that many of their food and drinks were not available. There were not many customers. The shop is quite spacious and quiet, with cute dogs and cats. And I feel that the road to the cafe is quite bad and the cafe is quite hard to find.
review_4_text:
This place feels like a museum, absolutely incredible. The architecture is stunning and the location is perfect. You can enjoy your favorite drink while watching and listening to the waterfall right in front of you.

A truly unique experience. A must-visit if you‚Äôre in Chiang Mai!
review_5_text: We came here just to try the coffee and cakes. There was limited desert options available when we were there and a western style menu. Nice atmosphere and good places to sit inside and out. Western style menu available. The coffee and croissant I had was very nice but can‚Äôt comment on other things on the menu.

name: Coffee or Me
review_1_text: Good coffee, good atmosphere, affordable price. Spacious garden. Wine spot next door. Love the fact they don‚Äôt use tissues at the toilet, handkerchiefs.
review_2_text: I‚Äôve visited this caf√© many times and it never disappoints! üåø‚òï The outdoor seating is surrounded by lush green space, while the indoor area is equipped with high-grade air purifiers, perfect for PM 2.5 days.üò∑ The coffee (I always order a non-sweet hot latte‚Äîeach photo is from a different day, but I usually order the same treats, haha!) is excellent, and the cakes üç∞ are equally delightful. The toilet üöª is clean, they use real fabric instead of tissues for sustainability üå±, and the service is consistently good. üëçüèª Plus, there‚Äôs plenty of parking. üöó Truly an impressive spot! üåü
review_3_text:
Review of Coffee or Me

Coffee or Me is a charming caf√© nestled within a hotel, which I happened upon by chance while driving through the area. It‚Äôs an ideal spot for those seeking a quiet, nature-filled retreat to work or unwind, offering a refreshing contrast to the bustling caf√©s in downtown Chiang Mai. With its lush greenery and serene atmosphere, the setting is undeniably inviting.

However, when it comes to the coffee, I found it somewhat underwhelming‚Äîperhaps because the caf√© prioritizes ambiance over the quality of its brews. Additionally, the service felt a bit distant, which slightly detracted from the overall experience. A more attentive approach to customer service could enhance both the atmosphere and the coffee itself, making this hidden gem even more enjoyable.
review_4_text:
A great find.   'Coffee or Me' is a coffee house about half an hour's drive northwest from Chiang Mai Central in a quiet area with lovely gardens.

From 2:00 to 4:00 on Sunday we had a jazz duo playing very good music,  otherwise it's a lovely quiet atmosphere there.

I had a panini sandwich which was excellent and the coffee, hot or cold, was equally good.

A little bit more expensive than other places but well worth it.   Highly recommended.
review_5_text:
Good coffee, delicious cheesecake, good seats for working on your laptop or studying.
Weekends are crowded but that‚Äôs not a surprise.

Aircon is too cold in some seats. The ice cold air is blasting you right in the face. Be careful where you sit

name: KonJohn Coffee Slowbar
review_1_text: Friendly relaxed atmosphere, with fans. Good cofee (latte 60 baht, Sep 25). The upstairs sitting area has a great view of the forest, mountain and road up Doi Suthep.
review_2_text: Very nice coffee with different roasts and very affordable. Nice view into the forest from the top floor!
review_3_text: Nice place to stop by for a good cup of coffee. Pleasant, airy, modern, up-cycling kind of atmosphere.  Top value for money.
review_4_text: Had a nice tasty cappuccino here. A nice relaxing spot.
review_5_text: Wee bit over priced coffee. Staff just pints to a sign when ordering coffee. Cheaper and better to go to 7/11 or the nearby shops

name: JUMB√Å COFFEE BAR
review_1_text:
This is an absolute Gem of a place. It's old and a bit rough around the edges, which adds to it's charm, but it's so serene with the waterfall right next to you, the sounds of frogs and birds and water.
Only had a snack but my brother ate here last time and said the food was great, the crumbed chicken strips I had was hand made with real breadcrumbs.
Just down the road from the Temple and worth a visit and a drink and something to eat.
review_2_text:
An almost secret coffee bar, beside the Huay Kaew waterfall, great to listen to the sound of rushing water, and watch butterflies and birds flitting about in the trees,whilst drinking excellent coffee

Entrance to this place is through the restaurant, which has an excellent, inexpensive menu. Best to spend time at both!
review_3_text: This place needs more attention! Great coffee and pad Thai, in a great building with stunning views of the waterfall as you sit
review_4_text: Hidden place, good music, amazing view, amazing coffee. I can‚Äôt believe there are no reviews currently. I will be back here often - my favorite coffee place in chiang mai by far
review_5_text: Great lemon honey tea and pad thai. Lovely and relaxing view too

name: WAR15COFFEE
review_1_text: Good  Americano hot coffees, a choice of roasts. Only 35 Baht each. Shady seating beside the road opposite the Arboretum
review_2_text: Easily the best capuccino in Thailand so far. Opposit lovely tree park. Arbotoreum
review_3_text: "This drink is so refreshing!"
review_4_text: The coffee shop next to the police station served large cups of coffee, but they were very bitter. I drank a cup of coffee there to escape the rain.
review_5_text: Cheap price but limited seating in front of the shop, only a few tables. You can park at the police station.

name: Caf√© Amazon
review_1_text: always great coffee , latte, new location , worth a stop for refresh.
review_2_text: Nice service, nice coffee but the air conditioning is not cool enough. Had to leave, it was too hot inside.
review_3_text: OK. Good location. Wi-Fi was so so. Toilets were a little bit far.
review_4_text: Circulation plan very good
review_5_text: Excellent

name: Fuel Coffee ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏™‡∏¥‡∏á‡∏´‡πå
review_1_text: As the store name suggests, it is located at the corner of the gas station. The space is actually fairly nice and it is equipped with many power outlets. It is a quiet AC space and the coffee was very good.
review_2_text: One of our favorites cafe. Coffee is good and the staff are polite.
review_3_text: Good crema to the cappuccino. Fuel toast is toast with butter spread and condensed milk but still nice. Nice comfortable seating with a lot of windowbto view out of. Decent speed to the free wi-fi. Will visit again.
review_4_text: Nice space inside. The coffee shop is next to gas station.
review_5_text: Did not expect good coffee and professional barista here.

name: Gomew Family Homestay
review_1_text: We had a wonderful 2 weeks stay here with our baby. The owners live next door and are always happy to help or share a BBQ in the evening. They even made the house baby safe before we arrived. The house is huge (3BR in total, big kitchen, living room, laundry area) and equipped with everything we needed (and we needed a lot üòÇ). It's close to the main road that brings you in 10-15 minutes in the city but you won't here the cars. We will definitely miss this place and come back here while visiting Chiang Mai. Thank you üôè
review_2_text: organic family
review_3_text:
I've stayed in hotels before, and this was my first time staying at a homestay in Chiang Mai (I wanted to give it a try).

The owner prepared everything for me. The kitchenware was complete with pots, pans, plates, bowls, a gas stove, microwave, oven, refrigerator, kettle, water filter, and more. They also provided tea, coffee, fruit, and bread. Wow! They were so generous, I was a little taken aback.

The water heater was great, with strong water pressure. They also provided large bottles of homemade shampoo and soap, which smelled amazing. Towels were provided in every room, and a hair dryer was provided.

If you need anything, just ask the owner. He was happy to help and provided it. He was incredibly friendly.

If I ever come to Chiang Mai again, I won't stay in a hotel. I'll definitely stay here.
review_4_text:
The house is lovely. We love that it has a kitchen for cooking.
The bedrooms are well-proportioned and quiet, perfect for a relaxing getaway. Book now without hesitation. It's a great value! Come with a group of friends or with your family. It's also close to the city and not far from Maya.
review_5_text: Clean, beautiful, comfortable, the owner is lovely and very attentive.

name: UCCK2 & A4C (Chiang Mai) - ‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó‡∏¢‡∏π‡∏ã‡∏µ‡∏ã‡∏µ ‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏ó‡∏π ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ ‡πÄ‡∏≠‡πÇ‡∏ü‡∏£‡πå‡∏ã‡∏µ (‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà)
review_1_text: The coffee in this shop is great! They actually sale everything you can think of about having your own coffee station at home. Their prices are also reasonable.
review_2_text: This is a very nice shop that sells only the highest quality coffee shop supplies. If you‚Äôre looking for anything like a coffee grinder, or coffee scale or coffee supplies in general for pour over and drop coffee then this place is great. Doesn‚Äôt speak much English here so go in with google and research how great the things are. Most of the goods are Japanese quality!
review_3_text: If u want to open a cafe or have some coffee by yourself at home, there are a lot to explore here.
review_4_text: Expensive, but has all u need
review_5_text: There are food, drinks, and honey. The taste is standard. The price is not high.

name: Minimal coffee chotana
review_1_text: It‚Äôs a small space but the drinks are delicious and the staff are very nice. I enjoy coming here
review_2_text: Big garden space to chill and it's pet-friendly üê∂ üò∫
review_3_text: Looking for a quiet place to read and work? This is the best! The staff are so kind; they probably worried about the heat and even brought a fan for me to sit outside. Their green tea and iced tea are amazing. I come almost every day because it's close to home, and they have a loyalty points program. The restrooms are convenient, they have food, and there's plenty of parking. Please come and support them! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
review_4_text: ‚ÄãI give it 5 stars at Minimal Coffee, Chotana branch. The coffee tastes excellent, true to its name. I ordered the Orange Presso and it was very good!!! The coffee is rich and fragrant, perfectly balanced with the sweet and sour flavor of the orange juice, making it very refreshing. It's worth more than the price. The service is also very impressive. All the staff are smiling and provide prompt service. Plus the barista who makes the coffee (as in the photo) is very good-looking, haha. He looks like he puts effort into making every drink. The atmosphere of the shop is decorated in a minimalist style, clean and very easy on the eyes.
review_5_text: Good coffee, quick service, polite staff. The hot chocolate is very rich and delicious. Prices are reasonable. Plenty of seating (in a garden area, but not hot, lots of trees). Clean restrooms. Plenty of parking.

name: ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏ü‡πà
review_1_text: The coffee is delicious. The atmosphere is good and the music is nice.
review_2_text: Lovely atmosphere, delicious menu. I recommend this restaurant.

name: Peace Pause Place
review_1_text: Cute little spot for some authentic Thai dishes. Great Time yum and curries. Huge portions, good service but nobody seemed to speak English so was difficult to order. Very creative rustic decor. On the Ping River, open concept. Really nice live music. Solo guy on guitar with a beautiful voice.
review_2_text: Lovely location on the banks of the river, this place has character which distinguishes it from other riverside restaurants and caf√©s in the area. A modest selection of craft beers is available. Would like to come back in the daytime and take advantage of their painting offer while having a coffee and watching the river flow by.
review_3_text: Everything is very good and also I need to recommended Matcha is very best with high-quality however I need to say because I love to paint the canvas, but they just has a small brushes and small size of canvas but it‚Äôs OK it worthy to see the river while painting.
review_4_text:
Had a simple but delicious lunch here beside the Ping River - cool gentle breeze blowing after a rain shower earlier this morning. Staff are polite and friendly.

Some customers come here to do some acrylic painting - ask at the counter and pay for the self painting session - you will be given a block of pine wood as your canvas or ask for a cloth canvas, some acrylic paint, painting brush and a small easel to paint to your heart's content!
review_5_text:
Very chilled place. Great for a relaxing afternoon. Drinks are top notch and reasonably prices. Can easily spend the full morning/afternoon just relaxing, eating and painting.
@tighttravellers

name: ‡∏Å‡∏∞‡∏õ‡πä‡∏≠ ‡∏≠‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏µ‡πâ
review_1_text:
A very humble eatery in my opinion and one with delicious food.
I am just a American guy wandering the side streets and alleyways looking for new food experiences.
I use Google translate or point at the pictures on the menu. The food was yummy. Also the side cup of soup was so tasty ( pork bone soup ).
I think the meal including a bottle of Coke was $1.75 or close to it.
Awesome experience for me .
review_2_text: Delicious coffee and my girlfriend had an amazing matcha latte, one of the best she said. And as bonus I got my face drawn on the cup how cool!!!
review_3_text:
Parking is generally available on the roadside, but it can be difficult to find a spot for cars.
I came today at dusk (salum salim in Northern Thai dialect üòâ).
It's a small shop with cute decorations. Floating lanterns in the canal next to the shop created a great atmosphere.
The atmosphere is chill, no air conditioning, but there's a slight smell of the canal water. üòÖ The iced tea with pearls is fragrant and delicious.
I like chewy pearls that aren't mushy. Here, the pearls are like large sago pearls. The green tea is fragrant and good. The staff are friendly, make the drinks well, quickly, and deliciously.
review_4_text: Coffee to order, delicious taste, satisfying coffee flavor, reasonable price, "Delicious until you forget your husband" by Trae
review_5_text: Ordered two drinks, waited 45 minutes, lots of people, good sales, few people making them, but the taste was delicious, worth the wait.

name: ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡πÅ‡∏ü‡∏à‡πä‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏° jang ngam coffee
review_1_text: I ate at the neighboring Khanomjin buffet and came here for coffee. It was outdoors, but not too hot, and the spacious interior made it comfortable. The coffee was rich and smooth, without being too acidic.
review_2_text:
Come support our customers' shop.
Great atmosphere and delicious coffee.
review_3_text: The atmosphere is great.
review_4_text: Well-rounded coffee

name: ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏°‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏¢‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏Ç‡∏†‡∏π‡∏°‡∏¥
review_1_text: Perfect meal to end our stay in Chiang Mai! The restaurant is so cute and is in the perfect location. The owner was very hospitable and the food was amazing! Give this restaurant a try, I promise you will be happy you did!
review_2_text: Just try it
review_3_text: It's a small but nice shop. Everyone is friendly and recommends the desserts available to try. The prices are great, only 10‡∏ø per cup, you can pick your own. They also have coffee and delicious-looking rice and curry dishes/Thai noodles. Today I had dessert, coffee, and butterfly pea flower lemonade soda. The desserts were delicious and not too sweet. Try stopping by to sample their Thai desserts; they have a really wide selection!
review_4_text: This restaurant has a complete selection of Thai food, drinks, and desserts, making it perfect for lunch. The prices are affordable, and most importantly, the food is delicious.
review_5_text:
Very cheap! 10‡∏ø per piece. üëçüëçüëç
Delicious desserts. They have a wide variety of food, tea, coffee, and Thai desserts. ü´∞
Parking is a bit difficult. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: S caf√© & Hashery
review_1_text: So chill. Great place to relax from the heat. Tasty food. Good music.
review_2_text: The food is delicious! I loved their crispy Southeast Asian-style omelet on top of the rice. I tried the Tom Yum Goong and Fish Soup‚Äîboth were excellent. The iced caf√© latte was also good. The ambiance is nice and relaxing, perfect for a hot day or while waiting for laundry next door.
review_3_text: Great cold and hot coffees in a nice quiet cafe with friendly service and wifi!
review_4_text: Very nice seating with laidback music.quiet and restful location with alot of small shops.
review_5_text: This shop's drinks are delicious and well-balanced üëçüèª

name: Cafe House
review_1_text: I like orange coffee.

name: ‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô Gift House
review_1_text: Delicious food, lovely owner
review_2_text: Very good

name: Dorle
review_1_text:
One of the best cafe in Chiang Mai! I came here for over a year now. Love flat white, bakery and the garden.

Plus, they just added food menu which made me come back 2 days in a roll! Highly recommended if you‚Äôre looking for a place to chill and enjoy high quality food and drinks ‚ù§Ô∏è
review_2_text:
Japanese garden is beautiful.
Interior is nice. Good coffee.
I think they run yoga classes too (drop in 350 or 390 baht)

Coffee is nice, pricey. But you pay for the atmosphere. Enjoy ‚ò∫Ô∏è
review_3_text:
A Beautiful, Pet-Friendly Caf√© in Chiang Mai With Amazing Matcha & Fresh Pastries

Dorle Coffee Shop in Chiang Mai is truly one of the most charming and peaceful caf√©s in the city. If you‚Äôre searching for a relaxing spot with great drinks, delicious pastries, and a pet-friendly environment, this place is a must-visit.

One of the highlights is their pure matcha (clear matcha) ‚Äî it‚Äôs absolutely spot on. Smooth, refreshing, and perfectly balanced, it‚Äôs one of the best matcha drinks you can find in Chiang Mai. They also offer a delightful selection of freshly baked pastries, all of which are incredibly yummy. Whether you love buttery croissants or other treats, everything tastes freshly made. They even have sourdough, which is a big plus for bread lovers.

Dorle is also wonderfully pet friendly. Dogs are welcome inside the air-conditioned area as long as they don‚Äôt disturb other customers, making it an ideal caf√© for hot Chiang Mai days. Their outdoor garden is another highlight‚Äîlush, beautifully manicured, and truly zen, perfect for relaxing with your drink or spending quiet time with your furry friend.

The staff are lovely, polite, and genuinely friendly, adding to the overall warm and welcoming atmosphere.

If you‚Äôre looking for a pet-friendly caf√© in Chiang Mai, a spot with excellent matcha, or a garden coffee shop with fresh pastries and sourdough, Dorle Coffee Shop is absolutely worth supporting and visiting. Highly recommended!
review_4_text:
I found this place by searching for a new cafe in town. I like its cozy, simple design and great brew. They offer a variety of coffee choices and recommend good ones that suit you. We only tried pretzels with pepper and Choux Cream. I like the soft and tender cream but not into pretzel. The price is reasonable, and the staff is friendly. If you come on the weekend, it might be packed, and some patisseries may be sold out.

Overall I like it and will try more bakeries next time.
review_5_text: I haven‚Äôt been to the caf√© in person, but my friend gave me their Amaretti cookies as a gift and they were AMAZING! Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, nutty, sweet‚Ä¶ Even though I haven‚Äôt tried the rest of the menu, the cookies were so good I had to write a review.

name: WhyD.cnx | Coffee Shop
review_1_text: Such a nice coffee shop! The staff are very kind and welcoming. Coffee tastes great and the atmosphere feels warm and relaxing. I felt very comfortable here.
review_2_text:
Everything is perfect!
I went on Sunday and there were not so many people but there were people coming all day.
review_3_text: Very nice open space with a nice garden. The barista here is great and he makes excellent coffee. I was gonna spend some time here, but there were many bugs in the garden as expected and the leaves from the tree kept falling into my cup, so I could not really get relaxed even though it‚Äôs such a nice space. I think you wanna wear long pants when you come here so you would be less distracted from the bugs.
review_4_text:
Nice place to hang out for those seeking peace and quiet still within the city boundary. The cafe is small but it has a large yard featuring tall trees and two friendly dogs.

One star less than perfection due to mosquitoes although they do provide spray.
review_5_text: Perfect little cafe. great cofffee, peaceful garden, super friendly staff, and cute dogs

name: TRAILER COFFEE ‡∏®‡∏π‡∏ô‡∏¢‡πå‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ä‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ä‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏¥
review_1_text: This Shop is Trailer Coffee Standard, Jikko ( Orange Americano)  is my order. Espressos in the bottom and Squeeze orange juice on the top decorate with olive leaf, Perfect!  it is Perfect. I love it. This is my favorite order when I visit Trailer Coffee, Never disappointed me.
review_2_text: Trailer coffee is my local go to caf√© in the area of Chang Khian. I really like that blend of Brazilian Colombian entire espresso roast. Gives a natural sweetness and with their creamy milk that they choose to do the lattes and and milk foam makes it a really nice coffee mouthful experience. I think this is a hidden jam and secret of this particular area, definitely come and check it out
review_3_text:
We drop in here for a quiet coffee.
It‚Äôs opposite the convention & expo halls. (Gate 5)
Relaxing after visiting the Shopping Exhibition.
Plenty of table and a good parking area.
A few doors before Oasis.
review_4_text: First best coffee you will find here early in the morning üôè
review_5_text: They left the outdoor seats completely wet, no way to see it and when I got my coffee I sat down my pants completely soaked behind? Embarrassed and forced to go home to change on a difficult day I really didn't need it. I know the girl said sorry but why do you leave a trap like that for customers when you are open? Hard to respect it

name: Sky cafe
review_1_text:
I been to the fleamarket close by and wanted to get some coffee.
Sky Cafe was the closest so i went to that place.
Turns out, its one of the most cozy cafe I been. The owner, a ver friendly thai guy, is very kind and helpful!
Their coffee is also very nice and quite cheap for that.
I had a hot cappuccino for 50 baht.
And their seating capability is also very good!
Definitely recommended!
review_2_text: A cute, family-run caf√© right by the main road, yet surprisingly chill. You might easily miss it because the small sign is hidden behind some bushes. The coffee is good and very affordable.
review_3_text: Nice little family run cafe that offers great coffee and friendly service. No fancy decors but this road side cafe gives you a pump-up in a lazy afternoon. The price is really reasonable compared to its coffee quality. Friendly and humble smiles from the owner beats all those trendy snobbish youngster cafe in town. Recommended!
review_4_text: The best cappuccino in town. Very nice cafe with friendly and humble owner. Relaxing atmosphere to enjoy the drinks. I always visit every time I'm in Chiangmai. Double ristretto and Thai iced tea are also my favorites. I have recommended this cafe to all my friends and they all love it. Drinks are very affordable.
review_5_text: The coffee is super good here and it is a quaint and cute little cafe. It is reall calm and serene here.

name: Chill Co
